curry.name: Dal Tadka

curry.name: Aloo Gobi Masala
curry.description: Potatoes and cauliflower cooked in north Indian style gravy

curry.description: Channa and palak with onions, tomatoes, cream and spices

curry.name: Butter Chicken
curry.description: Chicken cooked with spices, herbs and rich buttery sauce

curry.name: Chicken Mughlai
curry.description: Pieces of chicken in delicious creamy gravy with egg and coriander

curry.name: Chicken Chettinadu
